author: Special Correspondent
text: The district administration has sanctioned Rs. 1.25 crore for the execution of 10 rural development works – eight of them for laying or re-laying of roads, for ensuring transit of agricultural produce, particularly paddy from interior villages to Karaikal. Roadwork, when executed, will facilitate farmers to move their produce to the nearest town of Karaikal or Nagapattinam, according to official sources.
title: Rs. 1.25 cr. for roadwork
